BackgroundProps.componentDescription: Defines base properties for a generic background container component.

children.description: Optional React nodes to be rendered within the background component.

views.description: Optional styling properties for specific sub-components (container and content) within the background.

views.container.description: Optional ViewProps for the main container element of the background.

views.content.description: Optional ViewProps for the content wrapper element within the background.

themeMode.description: Determines the theme mode ('light' or 'dark') for background styling.

AuroraBackgroundProps.componentDescription: Defines properties specific to an animated Aurora-style background.

children.description: Optional React nodes to be rendered within the background component.

views.description: Optional styling properties for specific sub-components (container and content) within the background.

views.container.description: Optional ViewProps for the main container element of the background.

views.content.description: Optional ViewProps for the content wrapper element within the background.

themeMode.description: Determines the theme mode ('light' or 'dark') for background styling.

showRadialGradient.description: Controls the visibility of the radial gradient effect in the Aurora background.

MeteorsProps.componentDescription: Defines properties for a dynamic Meteors-style background effect.

number.description: Specifies the number of meteor elements to render.

children.description: Optional React nodes to be rendered within the Meteors component.

WallProps.componentDescription: Defines properties for a static Wall-style grid background.

rows.description: Determines the number of rows in the wall grid.

cols.description: Determines the number of columns in the wall grid.

squareSize.description: Specifies the size of each square cell in the wall grid.

ParticlesProps.componentDescription: Defines properties for an animated Particles-style background effect.

count.description: Specifies the number of particles to display.

colors.description: An array of colors to be used for the particles.

speed.description: Sets the animation speed for the particles ('slow', 'medium', or 'fast').

shapes.description: An array of shapes ('circle', 'square', or 'triangle') that particles can take.

GridProps.componentDescription: Defines properties for an animated Grid-style background.

gridSize.description: Specifies the size of the grid cells.

lineColor.description: Sets the color of the grid lines.

pulseColor.description: Sets the color for the pulsing effect on grid lines.

animationSpeed.description: Determines the speed of the grid animation ('slow', 'medium', or 'fast').

RipplesProps.componentDescription: Defines properties for an animated Ripples-style background effect.

rippleCount.description: Specifies the number of ripple effects to display.

colors.description: An array of colors to be used for the ripples.

maxSize.description: Sets the maximum size a ripple can expand to.

frequency.description: Determines how often new ripples are generated.

BackgroundImageProps.componentDescription: Defines properties for a background component using an image.

children.description: Optional React nodes to be rendered within the background component.

views.type: { container?: ViewProps; content?: ViewProps; image?: ViewProps; overlay?: ViewProps; }
views.description: Optional styling properties for specific sub-components (container, content, image, overlay) within the background image component.

views.container.description: Optional ViewProps for the main container element of the background image.

views.content.description: Optional ViewProps for the content wrapper element within the background image.

views.image.description: Optional ViewProps for the actual image element.

views.overlay.description: Optional ViewProps for the overlay element positioned over the image.

themeMode.description: Determines the theme mode ('light' or 'dark') for background styling.

src.description: The URL or path to the background image source.

backgroundSize.description: Specifies how the background image should be sized relative to its container.

backgroundPosition.description: Defines the initial position of the background image.

backgroundRepeat.description: Controls how the background image repeats (e.g., no-repeat, repeat-x, repeat-y).

backgroundAttachment.description: Determines whether the background image scrolls with the content or is fixed.

imageOpacity.description: Sets the opacity level of the background image.

overlay.description: A color or gradient string to apply as an overlay on top of the image.

blendMode.description: Specifies how the overlay color should blend with the background image.

BackgroundVideoProps.componentDescription: Defines properties for a background component using a video.

children.description: Optional React nodes to be rendered within the background component.

views.type: { container?: ViewProps; content?: ViewProps; video?: ViewProps; overlay?: ViewProps; }
views.description: Optional styling properties for specific sub-components (container, content, video, overlay) within the background video component.

views.container.description: Optional ViewProps for the main container element of the background video.

views.content.description: Optional ViewProps for the content wrapper element within the background video.

views.video.description: Optional ViewProps for the actual video element.

views.overlay.description: Optional ViewProps for the overlay element positioned over the video.

themeMode.description: Determines the theme mode ('light' or 'dark') for background styling.

src.description: The URL or path to the background video source.

autoPlay.description: Controls whether the video should start playing automatically.

loop.description: Controls whether the video should loop once it reaches the end.

muted.description: Controls whether the video's audio should be muted.

playsInline.description: Ensures the video plays inline on iOS devices, rather than fullscreen.

overlay.description: A color or gradient string to apply as an overlay on top of the video.

blendMode.description: Specifies how the overlay color should blend with the background video.

BackgroundGradientProps.componentDescription: Defines properties for a background component using a gradient.

children.description: Optional React nodes to be rendered within the gradient background component.
